titleStmt.title: The praise of folie. = Moriæ encomium a booke made in latine by that great clerke Erasmus Roterodame. Englisshed by sir Thomas Chaloner knight.
Moriae encomium. English
titleStmt.author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
Chaloner, Thomas, Sir, 1521-1565.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete in the house of Thomas Berthelet],

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon, which is wrongly dated: M.D.LXIX.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
